alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:24PM CDT until June 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TEXAS AND EAST CENTRAL CIMARRON COUNTIES... At 924 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Griggs, or 22 miles southwest of Elkhart, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Texas and east central Cimarron Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
